body_content.explanation: abbreviation for return on investment: the amount of interest or profit someone earns on an amount of money that they save or invest :
examples: Use our investment calculator to see the ROI you could get.
Last year my ROI was only 20%.

body_content.explanation: abbreviation for return on investment: the helpful or good effect that comes from something someone has given their time to or put a lot of effort into:
examples: Network hard and you will see an excellent ROI.
